node.text:
300+ educators with us today (and tomorrow) for in-person professional development. 
Their energy is infectious! 😆😆

Find out how you can join us for our next PD at www.ronclarkacademy.com/training. 
🎤: @kirkandre 
#ronclarkacademy #RCAEXP

node.text:
⁣
⁣
For the season 1 finale of ABV, our host Kirk Brown (@kirkandre) welcomed marketing executive and his longtime friend, Vivian Odior (@vivster007) to the screen! 📲⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
Vivian, who is the head of global integrated marketing for @whatsapp 🌍📞 joined us to talk about her career as a marketer and the driving forces that led her to where she is today. Also, she expanded on her efforts to enhance diverse representation in business, open doors for more women in marketing, and leverage her platform to impact communities everywhere.⁣⁣ 🤗⁣⁣🎉 ⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣——⁣⁣⁣⁣

node.text:
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
In our latest ABV chat, host Kirk Brown (@kirkandre) welcomed RCA social studies teacher and author Da’Nall Wilmer (@danalltyrell) and his best friend Chantel Powell (@mrsplaypits) to the screen! 📲 ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Da’Nall and Chantel, who are the founders of @boysinthegood and @playpits respectively, invited us to discover more about the journey they’ve taken from being student leaders together at Clark Atlanta University to supporting each other as entrepreneurs and community servants today! 🤝⁣⁣
⁣⁣
With the upcoming release of Da’Nall’s second book, #TheGreatBook - inspired by his friendship with Chantel - the two best friends chopped it up with Kirk to discuss the importance of teaching, uplifting, and loving both the introverts and extroverts in one’s class and environment.⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣——⁣⁣⁣

FREE PD is OTW! 😁 ⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣
On Tuesday, February 23rd at 7 PM ET, our team of @RonClarkAcademy educators are answering the call 📞 to provide educators everywhere with the PD they need!⁣⁣
⁣⁣
From sharing the newest educational resources to dropping innovative strategies to enhance student engagement and learning, we’ve got you covered! 😎⁣⁣
⁣⁣
💥 Tell your colleagues that #RCAEXP Online is BACK and our team is ready to run, drive 🚗💨 , or fly ✈️ to you to save the day! 🦸‍♀️⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
Powered By:⁣⁣
@Microsoft + Nielsen Foundation! 🧡⁣⁣
⁣⁣
No registration required. ❌ Just tune in to the RCA Facebook page to experience the PD live. ✔️ ⁣⁣

🎥: @davidrspearman

node.text:
⁣
⁣
In our latest chat, our host Kirk Brown (@kirkandre) welcomed his close friend — orator, author, and educator, Brandon Fleming (@bpfleming), to the ABV stage!⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
Brandon — who is the founder and CEO of the award-winning 🏆 🏆 🏆 Harvard Debate Council Diversity Project (@harvarddcdp) and assistant debate coach for Harvard University (@Harvard) — gifted us all with a riveting and rich conversation centered around equity, access, and opportunity for Black youth.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Using his personal experiences as his ambition to change the lives of those who are often unseen and unheard, Brandon shined a light on how cultural competence, love for humanity, and the ability to meet a person where they are at are crucial elements toward changing one’s life and future.⁣
⁣
If you missed it live, tap in and turn your volume 🆙 for this powerful conversation! 💬 ⁣
⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣——⁣⁣

node.text:
⁣
⁣
In our latest chat, ABV host Kirk Brown (@kirkandre) returned to the screen 📲 by bringing back our very first ABV guest, RCA’s own reading and social studies teacher, Michael Bonner! (@michaelbonner_)⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Back in July, Michael and Kirk cultivated a riveting conversation around Blackness in education and how it pertains to history, reading, entrepreneurship and more! Since IG didn’t let us save 💾 the first convo, we had to run it back for part 2!⁣
⁣⁣
Tap in and listen to @kirkandre and @michaelbonner_ as they discuss education, current events, culturally relevant teaching, student engagement, and more!⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣——⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣

node.text:
Amplify Black Voices: Ep 29⁣⁣⁣⁣
🗣🔊✊🏾⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣ ⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
ABV host Kirk Brown (@kirkandre) welcomes real estate 🏨 investors, Jessica Myers (@itsjessicamyers) and Davonne Reaves (@davonnereaves), to the screen! 📲 ⁣
⁣
Jessica and Davonne — former college roommates turned business partners — joined together to found @EpiqCollective, an Atlanta-based commercial real estate investment firm that helps people invest in hotels and multifamily projects. Recently, the duo became the youngest Black women to ever co-own a property under a major hotel chain after partnering a deal with Nassau Investments valued at $8.3 million! ⁣
⁣
Having now accomplished their dreams of owning their own hotel property, Jessica and Davonne joined Kirk to discuss this influential journey as Black women trailblazing a path that now opens new doors 🚪 for more Black women to follow.⁣
⁣

⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣——⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣

node.text:
⁣
⁣
In our latest chat, ABV host Kirk Brown (@kirkandre) welcomed poet, singer, and educator Shanelle Gabriel (@shanellegabriel) to the screen!📱 ⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
Possessing over 15 years of teaching and managing educational programming, Shanelle spoke about the work she does as the Interim Executive Director at @UrbanWordNYC, a non-profit organization that champions 🏆 youth voice through poetry & creative writing ✍🏽 workshops. ⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
As an artist 🎵 and an arts 🎭 educator, Shanelle  also painted a picture about the power of poetry and hip-hop in the classroom. As an advocate for Lupus, the illness she battles, she shined an honest light on the topic of caring for Black health and combating chronic illnesses affecting the Black community.⁣⁣ ⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣——⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
#ronclarkacademy #AmplifyBlackVoices⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣

node.text:
⁣
⁣
During our latest convo featuring Dr. Jones, Kirk and viewers were welcomed into her world as a Black educator and nationally-recognized mathematician ➗ 🏆 balancing personal life with purpose!⁣
⁣
An avid techie 👩🏽‍💻 and lover of gaming/ animation, her and Kirk discussed how she’s navigated her career in helping students acquire #mathesteem, developing a growth mindset within students, and so much more!⁣
⁣
They even played a game! 
Check this one out! 🥳 ⁣
⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣——⁣⁣⁣
#ronclarkacademy #AmplifyBlackVoices⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
#BlackLivesMatter⁣⁣⁣⁣ #AmplifyMelanatedVoices⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
#RCAInspired #ClubRCA #RCAEXP⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣

node.text:
Thank you to members of our board of trustees and advisory council for surprising our staff today with an appreciation lunch!⁣
⁣
Throughout RCA’s existence, our school has been blessed to have the most dedicated supporters and community leaders to serve as board and advisory council members.⁣
⁣
Without their extraordinary support and sincere care for our students, staff, and families, so much of the magic 🪄 we create simply wouldn’t be possible.⁣
⁣
Thank you to our trustees and council members for all that you do for us - we’re forever grateful! ♥️⁣

📸: @1jamezqua / Ron Clark Academy
——⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
#ronclarkacademy⁣ • #RCAInspired⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
#RCAEXP • #ClubRCA

node.text:
NEW ADMIN ALERT 🚨
Please join us in congratulating our very own, Dr. Valerie Camille Jones (@drvcjones), on her new appointment as RCA’s director of curriculum & instruction. 

An award-winning veteran educator with 20+ years of classroom teaching, Dr. Jones is highly sought-after to present on her creative instructional methods and practices, so we’re beyond thrilled for her to take on this additional leadership role supporting our academic program. 

Please join us in congratulating Dr. Jones on her promotion! 💙💙
—
#ronclarkacademy #RCAinspired
#SpelmanAlum #GeorgiaStateAlum 
#ColumbiaAlum

node.text:
Thank you, Alumni! ☺️

Throughout this summer, RCA was fortunate to provide PD experiences for hundreds of educators eager to head into the school year with innovative resources and valuable methods for student success! 💡 

In addition to our staff, students, and parent volunteers who interacted with all the awesome educators who visited us, we were honored to have numerous RCA alumni from various classes spend their time ensuring EXP attendees had the most incredible experience ever! 🎉 

Please join us in thanking these phenomenal alumni for their commitment to servant leadership and paying it forward!
⁣
——⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
#ronclarkacademy⁣ • #RCAInspired⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
#RCAHouseCon • #RCAHouseAcademy⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
#HouseSystem • #RCAEXP • #ClubRCA⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣

user.full_name: K I M  B E A R D E N

node.text:
Last Thursday and Friday, we were overjoyed to welcome over 5️⃣0️⃣0️⃣ educators for our first-ever, House Academy!⁣ 🤩
⁣
These educators came fired up 🔥 ready to adopt essential strategies and resources for improving student and whole-school success with the House System as the foundation. 👏 ⁣
⁣
The workshops they experienced in conjunction with the authentic interaction with students, staff, and RCA alumni combined to provide these educators with a valuable framework around the House System and subsequent topics including:⁣
⁣
✔️Student leadership and expectations⁣
✔️Parental involvement⁣
✔️Community engagement⁣
✔️Fundraising and communications⁣
✔️Events and traditions; and ⁣
✔️Much much more!⁣⁣
⁣⁣
If you’re in need of implementing RCA’s House System into your school culture, visit our official website to learn more!⁣⁣
⁣⁣
📸: @1jamezqua ⁣⁣
——⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
#ronclarkacademy⁣ • #RCAInspired⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣

node.text:
Tonight, we’re giving the Class of 2020 their well-deserved moment. 
We are so excited to celebrate them and all that they contributed to the Ron Clark Academy during their 4 years. It’s about to be a celebration! Let’s go, Class of 2020! 🎉 🎈🎓
—
#ronclarkacademy #Classof2020
#Celebrate2020 #Redo

node.text:
THIS IS HOW WE DO IT! 😝 • We slid into our Saturday with nothing but good vibes and gratitude for the 500 educators we welcomed at #RCAEXP this week!⁣
⁣
These educators gained new strategies for student success 💯, brought the life to the party 🎉 at @KimBearden’s book release event, and wrapped up their PD experience by becoming a part of our #slidecertified family! ✅ ⁣
⁣
🤷: What are you waiting for? 🔗 Tap the #LinkInBio to register for our remaining PD dates for the summer or those coming up in the fall!⁣

🎥: @davidrspearman 
——⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
#ronclarkacademy⁣ • #RCAInspired • #ClubRCA⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
#teacher • #iteachtoo • #teacherlife⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣

node.text:
Flashback to last week Friday and Saturday when we hosted our first-ever RCA Houses Conference, #HouseCon! 🥳⁣
⁣
Over the span of two days, we brought together schools and educators from all over who have completely immersed themselves into RCA’s House System and changed the dynamics of their schools forever. 🖤❤️💚💙⁣
⁣
From a turnt 🆙 party where all 4 Houses were represented to engaging workshops based on the House System, these teachers were into the thick of it! On top of that, educators observed how the House System engages students live in the classroom 🙋🏽‍♀️🙋🏼🙋🏻‍♂️🙋🏾‍♂️ while also having a blast ripping and running through the school competing in House Games! 🎲⁣
⁣
If you’re interested in adopting RCA’s House System into your school culture, visit our official website to learn more!⁣
⁣
📸: @melisswhite ⁣
——⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣

node.text:
FIGHT SONG LIVE! 💪🎵📺 ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Join us TODAY at 5 PM EST on RCA’s Facebook Live for RCA cofounder @KimBearden’s Book Release Party! 📕 ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
The 2nd edition of Fight Song: Six Steps to Passion, Power, Peace, and Purpose is NOW AVAILABLE 🤩, featuring brand new elements including end-of-chapter exercises 📝 and book study questions. ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Hosted by RCA’s chief development and communications officer, @kirkandre, as well the Academy’s director of information technology and dean of students, @mrjbernadin, today’s Live broadcast will include interviews from #RCAEXP attendees and RCA staff, highlight the book release event, and provide insight to the inspiration behind the book with the author herself!⁣⁣
⁣⁣
🗣: Are you ready to sing your FIGHT SONG?⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Tune in TODAY at 5 🖐 on Facebook Live and visit www.KimBearden.com to grab your copy right now!⁣⁣
——⁣⁣
#ronclarkacademy • #fightsong⁣⁣

node.text:
C H A M P I O N! • ⁣At this year’s first-ever RCA Houses Con, the recipients of the esteemed awards were surprised with supersized pennants and championship belts to commemorate their success!

Please join us in extending another round of congratulations to all the deserving award winners of our 2nd Annual RCA House Awards!⁣
⁣
Ultimate House of the Year⁣
💙 House of Rêveur at Ketchum Elementary (Ketchum, OK)⁣
⁣
International Altruismo House of the Year⁣
🖤 Ketchum Elementary (Ketchum, OK)⁣
⁣
International Amistad House of the Year⁣
❤️ Spearman Elementary (Piedmont, SC)⁣

Global Ambassador of the Year⁣
❤️ Hannah Grace Ward⁣
Spearman Elementary (Piedmont, SC)⁣
⁣
International Isibindi House of the Year⁣
💚 Ketchum Elementary (Ketchum, OK)⁣
⁣
International Rêveur House of the Year⁣
💙 Harrisburg Elementary (Harrisburg, NC)⁣
(Not pictured)
⁣
📸: @melisswhite 
⁣
Stay tuned for all the scenes from our inaugural RCA Houses Conference! 😝
⁣
——⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
